summary: The diff implements 3 of 4 requirements. REQ-40 (SkelUlt logo in Layout header) and REQ-41/42/43 (Enable/Disable follow button with animations) are implemented. However, the actual logo image file (skelult-logo.dim_200x60.png) is not present in the diff, creating an implementation gap.

missing_requirements.requirement: Logo uses the generated image asset from frontend/public/assets/generated
missing_requirements.reason: The Layout.tsx component references /assets/generated/skelult-logo.dim_200x60.png, but the actual image file is not included in the diff. The BuildRequest explicitly requires 'Images required: SkelUlt logo... (skelult-logo.dim_200x60.png)' but no image file was added.
